articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Apple reportedly considers letting Anthropic and OpenAI power Siri - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple is reportedly considering using AI models from OpenAI and Anthropic to power its updated Siri, rather than using in-house technology.
articles.content: Apple is considering using AI models from OpenAI and Anthropic to power its updated version of Siri, rather than using technology the company has built in-house, according to a report from Bloomberg … [+783 chars]
